articles.title: Daniel Kahneman, Nobel Prize-winning psychologist, 1934-2024 - Financial Times
articles.description: An accidental invader of economics, his insights changed the discipline forever
articles.content: Economics is a notoriously imperialist discipline: economists are more prone to colonising other scholarly fields than to be colonised by them. The single biggest exception was Daniel Kahneman, the s… [+4449 chars]

articles.title: ‘Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire’ Makes Roaring Start in China - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Warner Bros. and Legendary Entertainment MonsterVerse movie is on track to become the biggest U.S. film at China's box office this year.
articles.content: Warner Bros. and Legendary Entertainment’s Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire made a suitably thunderous start at China’s theatrical box office Friday. The film had earned about $7 million (RMB 50 milli… [+1255 chars]
